formulas.name: AccestypeVarStandardExtraAll
QueryBuilderOndemndOrderLineItem
formulas.expression: if( not(ISNULL({!subtypeOndemand})), "SELECT Id,Product2.Name,ServiceDate,EndDate FROM OrderItem where Product2.Sub_Type__c = '" +{!subtypeOndemand} +"' AND Product2.Location__c = '" + {!The_opportunity.Location__r.Id}+"'", "SELECT Id,Product2.Name,ServiceDate,EndDate FROM OrderItem where Product2.Sub_Type__c = '" +{!Product_Sub_TypeExtraFALL} +"' AND Product2.Location__c = '" + {!The_opportunity.Location__r.Id}+"'")

formulas.name: QueryBuilderScreenOndemandEnrtyFetcher
formulas.expression: if( not(ISNULL({!subtypeOndemand})), "SELECT Id, Name FROM PricebookEntry where Product2.Sub_Type__c = '" +{!subtypeOndemand} +"' AND Product2.Location__c = '" + {!The_opportunity.Location__r.Id}+"'", "SELECT Id, Name FROM PricebookEntry where Product2.Sub_Type__c = '" +{!Product_Sub_TypeExtraFALL} +"' AND Product2.Location__c = '" + {!The_opportunity.Location__r.Id}+"'")

formulas.name: QueryBuilderScreenStandardEnrtyFetcher
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, Name FROM PricebookEntry WHERE Product2.Sub_Type__c = '" & {!BuilderScreenStandardDepnadentPicklist.middleValue} & "' AND Product2.Location__c = '" & {!The_opportunity.Location__r.Id} & "'"

formulas.name: QueryPriceBookEntrySerie
formulas.expression: if( not(ISNULL( {!Product_Sub_TypeForOndemandserie} )), "SELECT Id, Name FROM PricebookEntry where Product2.Sub_Type__c = '" +{!Product_Sub_TypeForOndemandserie} +"' AND Product2.Location__c = '" + {!The_opportunity.Location__r.Id}+"'", "SELECT Id, Name FROM PricebookEntry where Product2.Sub_Type__c = '" + {!Product_Sub_TypeForOExtraserie} +"' AND Product2.Location__c = '" + {!The_opportunity.Location__r.Id}+"'")

formulas.name: QueryStandardOrderitem
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, Product2.Name, ServiceDate, EndDate FROM OrderItem " & "WHERE Product2.Sub_Type__c = '" & {!BuilderScreenStandardDepnadentPicklist.middleValue} & "' " & "AND Product2.Location__c = '" & {!The_opportunity.Location__r.Id} & "'"

formulas.name: solq1
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, Name, Product2.Name FROM PricebookEntry where Product2.Sub_Type__c = '" + {!Arnona} +"' AND Product2.Location__c = '" + {!The_opportunity.Location__r.Id}+"'"

formulas.name: soql
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, Name, Product2.Name FROM PricebookEntry where Product2.Sub_Type__c = '" +"' AND Product2.Location__c = '" + {!The_opportunity.Location__r.Id}+"'"
